name: Non-Saudi Vacation Report
query:
Select

A.name as "ID:Link/Leave Application:120",
A.employee as "Employee:Data:100",
A.employee_name "Employee Name:Data:140",
A.department as "Department:Data:140",
A.from_date as "From date:Date:80",
A.to_date "To Date:Date:80",
A.total_leave_days "Total Leave Days:Data:120",
A.leave_type "Leave Type:Data:120",
A.taa_exit_re_entry_issued as "Exit Re-Entry Issued:Data:140",
A.taa_ticket_issued as "Ticket Issued:Data:110",
A.taa_iqama_returned as "Iqama Returned:Data:110",
A.taa_returned_from_vacation_ as "Returned from Vacation:Data:160"

FROM

`tabLeave Application` as A

Where

A.taa_exit_re_entry_issued = %(taa_exit_re_entry_issued)s
&& A.taa_ticket_issued = %(taa_ticket_issued)s
&& A.taa_iqama_returned = %(taa_iqama_returned)s
&& A.taa_returned_from_vacation_ = %(taa_returned_from_vacation_)s
&& A.docstatus="1"
